name: Hachi Quest: The Mountain King
description:
This game is currently a demo!  CHOOSE A CHARACTER

Choose a character and then follow Hachi and her sister Rava on a quest to acquire a mystical flower that takes a turn for the unexpected!

[more to be added]

CURRENT FEATURES

~3 Characters to choose from

~Around 25 min run

~Fully composed original soundtrack

~Gentle animations in certain scenes

~Silly bone man!

~15K+ Words (But not all of it is currently playable)

FEATURES TO BE ADDED

Disclaimer: Features are also due to change depending on any circumstance, there may be more or less depending on how much I know I can do and learn at this time. I've very new at this 🙏 If I learn more this month, I'd like to do more! If I find there are things that are harder to do than anticipated, then things will also change.

~3 Main Endings 

~3 Sub Endings

~Even more music!

~And more things that I currently can't think of right now! 

For the most part, all backgrounds and character sprites are ready to go, I just need to  plug them into the game, and adjust some of the script.

ARTIST'S NOTE

This is my very first Visual Novel, and game (outside of bitsy <3) that I've made! 

I don't consider myself a good storyteller, and sometimes I have a hard time posting things I make because I really get in my head about the stuff I make. I often have it stuck in my head that my work is too lousy to be enjoyed, so for the most part I don't post 80% of the music, art, and creations I make or dabble in,  but I'm still really proud of myself for being able to try my hand at game making, so this is the start of it. 

I usually just do music, and a little art, but I do plan to make more installments like this in Visual Novel format, but maybe when I'm braver I can try other engines and gameplay styles

This is currently a demo! There may be bugs, typos and other things that may need tweaking in this version. It doesn't have all the features I'd like to have in it, and currently there is only one ending, but I plan to finish this game in the month of April!

OTHER INFO

This was made during the NaNoRen0 2023 game jam! 

Music & Sound Design made with FL Studios

Art made with Procreate

Game made with Tyrannobuilder

Music, Sound Design, Art, Story by me! 

CONTENT WARNING

Disclaimer: Not all of these warnings are currently present in the demo version but will be present in the full version.

~Suggestive humor

~Disturbing imagery

~A little blood

~Very mild body horror

~Trypophobic elements [Fear/disgust of holes]
